participant_1.background: i dance on the weekends. i compete in dog agility classes. i don't care about fashion. i hate the color orange.

participant_2.name: Jake
participant_2.personality: Jake is adventurous and bookish, balancing his daring job with a love of literature. He has a strong sense of tradition and values his upbringing.
participant_2.background: i never broke a bone in my body ever in my life. i am a stunt double as my second job. i read twenty books a year. i was raised in a single parent household. i only eat kosher.
